statements: UPDATE CustomerFeedback SET sentiment_score = 4.5 WHERE feedback_id = 1;

UPDATE CustomerFeedback SET sentiment_score=5.3, customer_name='Jane Smith', feedback_text='Could be better' WHERE feedback_id=2
UPDATE customer_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Updated feedback text' WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE feedback_themes SET theme_name = 'Customer Experience' WHERE theme_id = 2;
UPDATE customer_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Great service!', date_submitted = '2022-09-15' WHERE feedback_id = 101
UPDATE feedback_themes SET theme_name = 'Excellent' WHERE feedback_id = 101
UPDATE customer_feedbacks SET feedback_text = 'Excellent service' WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE feedback_analysis SET sentiment_analysis = 'Positive', keyword_analysis = 'Satisfaction' WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE customer_feedbacks SET feedback_text = 'Excellent service', feedback_date = '2022-10-01' WHERE feedback_id = 101
UPDATE feedback_analysis SET keyword_analysis = 'Customer satisfaction, service quality' WHERE feedback_id = 101
UPDATE customer_feedback SET rating = 5 WHERE customer_id = 123
UPDATE comment_themes SET theme_description = 'New description' WHERE theme_id = 10
UPDATE customer_feedback SET rating = 4, feedback_text = 'Great service!' WHERE customer_id = 12345;
UPDATE customer_data SET customer_location = 'New York', customer_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE customer_feedback SET feedback = 'Great service!', rating = 5 WHERE customer_id = 123
UPDATE feedback_topics SET topic_keywords = 'excellent, satisfaction, top-notch' WHERE topic_id = 5
UPDATE customer_feedback SET rating = 5, feedback = 'Great service and excellent products' WHERE customer_id = 123
UPDATE customer_sentiments SET sentiment_label = 'Positive', sentiment_score = 0.8 WHERE customer_id = 456
